Text:
Mr. Shadow, I'm glad you could come today. It's a
modest meal, but please enjoy it.
...This is pretty extravagant.

You helped us with the incident in the Lawless City.
This is my way of showing gratitude. Besides―
I hear you've teamed up...with Alpha and the others.
Heheh... You're well-informed as always, Mr. Shadow.

(So...she's also interested in playing shadowbroker
games, huh?)

(Wait? Did she call me here...as part of her
scheme?)

(Now that I think about it, this is a private
meeting. The perfect scenario to play the
role of a shadowbroker...)

M-Mr. Shadow...? Please don't stare at me like
that...

No, not that I dislike it! I just wasn't quite ready
for it... A-Anyway, let's eat before it gets cold!
Right, let's.
I hope it's to your liking...
...Hmm.
(This is delicious! It tastes so...luxurious!)

(But as a shadowbroker, I shouldn't get distracted
by good food. Gotta stay on track!)
...So, wasn't there something you wanted to discuss?
Huh?
Huh?

(The meal was just a pretext... In all honesty, my
ulterior motive was to get closer to him.)

(Mr. Shadow is a sharp one. Could he have seen
right through me?!)

...Impressive, Master Shadow. I can't hide anything
from you. You've seen through my intentions...

The meal was just an excuse. What I really wanted...
was to get to know you better...
Get to know me better...

(I see, comradeship, huh? Yukime wants to engage in
more intense shadowbroker games... Heheh. Fine
then.)

(I figured she had the aptitude for it when we made
the counterfeit bills. My judgment was correct!)

(Alright, if that's what she wants...I'm all for it.
From what I've heard about the current state
of the Lawless City—)
Then, will you come with me?
Huh? Where to...?

You should know without being told. Tonight, we hunt
the greedy beasts lurking in this land.

(Mysterious figures secretly hunting down thieves...
laying the groundwork for future plot developments—
that's the core of these sorts of games.)
Greedy beasts...? You don't mean...!

I recently heard that since Juggernaut disappeared,
the remnants of the Black Tower have been causing
chaos...
Hm?

These beasts must be those remnants. To think you
would go out of your way to maintain order in the
Lawless City... You truly are―
Hmm?

(Mr. Shadow has invited me on such an important task.
He must have accepted my desire to get to know him
better...)

(No, it's not just my desires. Mr. Shadow cares even
for the masses who have nothing to do with him...
Heheh... You truly are unmatched.
Uh, right...

(It feels like we're not quite on the same page,
but...oh well.)

Heh... Let's enjoy our meal first. After that,
it's showtime...

(Now's my chance! I've gotta savor this lavish
dinner while I can!)

Oh dear, Mr. Shadow. No need to rush. The beasts
aren't going anywhere.

(I understand. You wish to deliver peace to the
Lawless City as soon as possible... That’s what
you're thinking, isn't it?)
Heheh. You are too kind...
